Label: Dataset (class)
Definition: A collection of data, published or curated by a single agent, and available for access or download in one or more formats.

Label: Dataset title
Definition: A name given to the record.

Label: Dataset description
Permitted Encoding Scheme &: rdfs:Literal - literal values, eg. textual strings and integers
Example: A list of community gardens with geolocations.

Label: Language
Usage Notes: --This overrides the value of the catalog language in case of conflict.
